text: 3.2-3 Jon 16.12, 1 Ko 1.10-11, 11.18, Gal 5.20-21, Hib 5.12-14, Jem 3.16, 1 Pi 2.2 Ñapay ŋaŋ tul ñɨŋeb tek ak mɨdebek, binɨb awl tap ñɨbal tek ma mɨdebek. Anɨb ak bin kɨli ñapay ŋaŋ tul ñɨbal tek nɨbop agñɨnek. Nɨbop God takaw ogɨnap agñɨnek, ogɨnap agñen ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb tek lak ak ma agñɨnek. Mɨdobun ñɨn awl abe, tap lum awl yɨl gos nɨgɨlɨg yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm tek, God takaw ogɨnap agñen nɨgɨnɨmɨb tek ma lup. Anɨb apin, nɨbi mam ay okok kɨlop nɨgem chɨbol nɨbop ak tɨmel gɨl, mɨlɨk yapek penpen agɨl mɨdebɨm. Pel anɨgɨpɨm ak yad nepin, tap lum awl yɨl gos nɨgɨlɨg yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, binɨb lum awl okok gɨpal tek gɨpɨm.
